It occurs at the windows version (Win 2k) and the linux (SuSE 8.1).

To reproduce it just call the code assist in a <sql> tag in a build.xml
<target name="useless">
  <sql driver="" password="" url="" userid="">
    <!-- call it here -->
  </sql>
</target>

We were not correctly handling elements that had a "mixed" model i.e.
(#PCDATA|...)*
The two elements that I know of that fall in this category are concat and sql.

Fixed in Element, IElement and SchemaFactory and added CodeCompletionTests for 
this bug.
